title: oc 6 rc 4 - broken 'new from url'
body:
when i try to upload file from 'new -> from url", oc show a empty popup and follow error in js console:
- chromium: eventsource's response has a mime type ("text/html") that is not "text/event-stream". aborting the connection. 
- iceweasel: iceweasel can't establish a connection to the server at http://owncloud.spyro.it/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/ajax/newfile.php?dir=%2f&source=https%3a%2f%2fwww.google.it%2fimages%2fsrpr%2flogo11w.png&filename=logo11w.png&requesttoken=a0985cb72487a3ea16da.

no apache errors

### steps to reproduce
- log in on http://owncloud.spyro.it user: oc_test pass: oc_test
- trying to upload file 'new -> from link' with this image https://www.google.it/images/srpr/logo11w.png

### server configuration
machine: shared hostgator server
webserver: apache 2.2.23
os: centos release 6.4 (final)
php: ~~5.2.17~~ 5.3.27
db: sqlite
owncloud: 6 rc4
